p-uploadPhoto.en: Upload a photo or give me the image link

p-links.en:
Add links.
Use /skip on end.

Please enter a valid url, to short it type `s ` before link url

p-linkTitle.en: Enter title of the link button

p-linkUrl.en: Enter url of the link button

p-sectionHeader.en: Type Section header with any format you want!

p-linksHeader.en: Type columns header with any format you want!

p-arrayLinks.en:
Enter row title on first line
And enter each link on seperate line like this:
Title
label1:http://example.com
